articles.author: IGNATIUS SSUUNA
articles.title: Rwanda’s Marburg fever deaths rise to 11 as its source is still being investigated - The Associated Press
articles.description: Health authorities say Marburg hemorrhagic fever has killed 11 people in Rwanda. The East African country is searching for the source of an outbreak first traced among patients in health facilities. Rwanda's government said Thursday that there are 36 confirme…
articles.content: KIGALI, Rwanda (AP) Marburg hemorrhagic fever has killed 11 people in Rwanda, health authorities said Thursday, as the East African country searches for the source of an outbreak first traced among p… [+3974 chars]
